channel.title: iTunes on Andrew Bancroft
channel.description: Recent content in iTunes on Andrew Bancroft

item.title: Create Sound Clips from iTunes
item.description: Open iTunes. (optional) Import any songs you’d like to make clips for. Select (click) the song that you’d like a sound clip for so that it’s the only one selected. Right-click that song and select “Get Info”. A window will appear â€“ Click “Options” to access the screen to set your start and stop times. Check the boxes next to “Start Time” and “Stop Time”. Enter a start time in the text box next to “Start Time”.
